summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1076, for the improvement of Grand Boulevard, from Thirteenth Avenue West to Twenty-fourth Avenue West, certain other streets and certain parts of certain other streets therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein wooden sidewalks, with wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 12358 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
